logistic.R: Metaquest campaign backlog: manuscript cadence, outreach milestones, endorsement alignment.
logistic.Theta: Parity brief + codex echo + UTAC status matrix updated within 24h.
logistic.zeta: Kept stable through BreakPoint rituals, telemetry syncs, and endorsement rehearsals.

meta.resonance: Compass vectors orienting the Metaquest campaign lane without losing falsifiability.

vectors.name: Manuscript Telemetry Sync
vectors.description: Keep manuscript updates mirrored in parity brief and codex entries.
actions: Log ΔAIC / governance shifts in seed/codexfeedback.*

null_model.description: Manuscript revision not mirrored in parity brief.
response: Freeze outreach comms until parity restored.

vectors.name: Outreach Resonance Loop
vectors.description: Coordinate press kit, endorsements, and simulator playlist with the Metaquest storyline.
actions: Archive rehearsal transcript in codex with mq-sci scope.
Log endorsements in codex with mq-sci scope + backlog row.

response: Re-run BreakPoint ritual before next announcement.

vectors.name: Telemetry + Codex Echo
vectors.description: Ensure sigillin_sync exports include campaign annotations and codex records mq-sci scope.
actions: Record run id + timestamp in compass + bridge.
Notify shadow compass of telemetry cadence.
Attach sigillin_sync run id + backlog reference to compass narrative.

null_model.description: Telemetry export skipped or codex silent on mq-sci scope.
response: Document recovery in UTAC matrix and codex.

vectors.name: Backlog Cross-Link
vectors.description: Mirror UTAC backlog rows + mq-gap ids inside campaign compass + bridge entries.
actions: Cite mq-bridge-gap-001…006 when campaign milestones shift.
Record codex entry referencing backlog row + telemetry timestamp.
Update bridge dashboard with backlog pointer within 24h.

null_model.description: Backlog adjustments not reflected in campaign compass.
response: Re-run BreakPoint ritual and annotate backlog in codex.

telemetry.notes: Campaign lane still mirrors timestamp manually; backlog mq-bridge-gap-002 and mq-bridge-gap-006 track automation needs.
